Description: Gold finger-ring with two sapphire settings; simple thin hoop with raised settings.
Bibliographic references: Finger Ring / Catalogue of the Finger Rings, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum (851)
SCE IV/3 / Swedish Cyprus Expedition (p. 120, Finger Ring no. 5)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Luigi Palma di Cesnola
